mapper.select: select a.article_id, a.article_title, a.author_id, a.article_image, a.article_desc, a.article_content, a.article_attachments, a.edit_content, a.edit_model, a.article_category, a.good_count, a.read_count, a.collect_count, a.comment_count, a.source_mark, a.article_source, a.state, a.remark, a.memo, a.is_top, a.is_enabled, a.creator_id, a.creator_name, a.updater_id, a.updater_name, a.created_time, a.updated_time, c.category_name as categoryName from ar_article as a left join ar_category as c on a.article_category = c.category_id where a.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 and a.article_id = #{id}
